reviewText: This is a story about  Chinese minority -Bai people and how they want to kept their culture and history by adopted it to the modern life style.  The Yunan scenery is beautiful,  like the super beautiful actress and those real Original Bai people.

This movie shows some characters of yunan, also many culture and traditions of Bai manority--one of 56 chinese races.  I like the act of the teacher Huang, also glad this film tells about how to kept the historical village in modern days.
The actress is very beautiful, many great photos that show how beautiful the yunan is. worth to watch it
